meanings.definition: A person who sits next to another person, especially in a confined space such as on a plane or bus.
meanings.sent1: My seatmate on the bus was friendly and shared their snacks with me.
meanings.sent2: I hope my seatmate on the flight isn't too talkative.
meanings.sent3: My seatmate on the train kept falling asleep and leaning on my shoulder.
meanings.sent4: In the crowded theater, my seatmate felt like a comforting presence in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The chatty seatmate made the long journey more enjoyable with their stories.
